name: Windy City Radio - Jam Version.
description:
An exploration into the soft-apocalypse/cozy catastrophe genre.  The world, once wrought in war and destruction has had the chance for nature to reclaim it. Those who descend from the survivors of the apocalypse have found a place to call home. amongst the destruction & reminders of a world long since passed.  Initially there was going to be a little puzzle to wake the robot up, and a second area within the city, but I didn't get much time to actually work on this outside of the first week, so it's pretty much just an art test as this point.  Made for the Waypoint New Jam City Game Jam, based on the episode title Windy City Politics. 

Made with ❤ by
